DeliveryAddress.AddressLine: Om Niwas, 14 main, 4 cross, HSR layout

StructuredXMLResume.Objective: To strive for excellence in the organization by contributing my knowledge & perseverance in process development of projects, Business strategy & Market analysis in time for success of the organization as well as mine too.

PositionHistory.Title: Business Development & Support
PositionHistory.Description:
(Biocon Ltd.) Global Marketing / B2B General - Executive, Commercial Strategy & Business Development Aug'14 - Present (9 months).
Projects Undertaken: Project 1 (on-going): Corporate licensing and deals Role: Business Development & Support Responsibilities/Activities: Operational support in corporate licensing deals. Acquaintance with different agreement like CDA, License, Supply and distribution agreements. Coordination with Legal, finance, regulatory & quality team for finalization of agreement and coordination with external partner for the execution process.
Project 2: Products (drugs of Hep C) launch in India Role: Project Planning & Management Responsibilities/Activities: Market research and analysis on Hep C drugs through primary and secondary research. Studied on treatment regimen and prevalence of Hep C in India. Lead project management & coordination with cross functional teams regarding various launch activities.
Project 3 (on-going): New Market Entry (outside India) & Joint Venture Role: Strategy & Business Development Responsibilities/Activities: Analyze the Pharma market of respective country through primary and secondary research. Identifying the potential companies & prospective therapeutic segments for entering into the market. Joint venture Business proposal & negotiation with the partners.
Project 4: Business Deals & Due diligence Role: Strategy & Business Support Responsibilities/Activities: Business deal structures between Biocon and partner (outside India) for Indian market. Market analysis and for:wecasting approach for partner's products. Cross functional team coordination for the due diligence.

PositionHistory.Title: Analysis, Strategy & Business Development
PositionHistory.Description:
Project 5: Other Projects for Commercial Strategy & Business Development Role: Analysis, Strategy & Business Development Shivangi Porwal 2015
Responsibilities/Activities: Analyze ANDA Molecules for generic formulation in ROW Market. Business case preparation & presentation support. Forecasting approach in Emerging Market. Development and interpretation of Business database & documentations. Project management to update & analyze the business on SMV BU.

PositionHistory.Title: MIS Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
(Biocon Ltd.) Brand Formulation Business (Cardiology) - Executive, MIS Analyst & SFE Oct'12 - Jul'14 (1 year 10 months).
Projects Undertaken: Project 1: MIS (Management Information System) handling Role: MIS Analyst Responsibilities/Activities: Analyze Micro Detail overview. Designed, developed, managed and facilitate the needs data assessment to team.
Project 2: Pharma Market & Sales Analysis Role: Market & Sales Analyst Responsibilities/Activities: Analyze External & Internal Pharma market to assist PMT for strategic directions. Proficient in various databases & tools like IMS, AIOCD & CMARC. Perform Sales insights analysis and inferences for Cardiology division & deliverables to team. Sales Budgeting & P&L insight calculation & analysis
Project 3: SFE (Sales force effectiveness) Role: Analyst & SFE Responsibilities/Activities: Field activity insight & Incentive analysis to assist marketing & management. Analyze field force daily activity summary and deliverable to field.
Competence Summary Data management, data analysis, data reporting and interface. MIS & Market research analysis with different database, tools & techniques. Sales force effectiveness. Project management for internal business & new business proposals. Licensing agreement and amendment.

Degree.Comments: Banasthali University, Rajasthan, Master of Science in Bioinformatics, 2010, 63.00%.
Chatrapati Shahuji Maharaja University, Kanpur, Bachelor of Science in Biotechnology, 2008, 67.00%. U.P.Board (Allahabad), Auraiya, 12th in Science, 2005, 70.40

by various Machine Learning Techniques".

Qualifications.QualificationSummary: Key Credentials • Market Analysis tools: Global IMS (IMS PADDS, IAM), AIOCD and CMARC. • Pharma databases: Oneview Med Trek, Data monitor, New Port Horizon. • Reporting Tools: SAS V9, SAS/BASE, SAS/ODS, SAS/Graph. • MS Office Suite: MS Word, MS Power Point, MS Excel, MS Outlook. • MS Excel: Advance Excel skill, Pivot table, Vlookup, Hlookup. Shivangi Porwal 2015

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Shivangi Porwal's experience appears to be concentrated in Information Technology / Project Management, with exposure to Marketing / Market Research. Shivangi Porwal's experience appears to be LOWER-TO-MID LEVEL, with about 3 years of experience, with no management experience. WARNING: The candidate's primary experience appears to be in Information Technology, but the Job Objective appears to show interest in a different area (Hardware Engineering).
